commands.name: connect4
commands.description: Starts a game of connect four against another player.
commands.arguments: Takes in a parameter for a user's mention.

commands.name: tictactoe
commands.description: Starts a game of tic tac toe against another player.
commands.arguments: Takes in a parameter for a user's mention.

commands.name: rockpaperscissors
commands.description: Plays a game of rock paper scissors versus an AI.

commands.name: help
commands.description: Shows the manual for the bot.
commands.arguments: Takes in an optional parameter for what command you want to read about.

commands.name: support
commands.description: Sends the link to get support.

commands.name: ping
commands.description: Gets how fast the bot's connection to discord is.

commands.name: invite
commands.description: Sends the link to invite the bot

commands.name: vote
commands.description: Sends the link to vote for the bot.

commands.name: prefix
commands.description: Retrieves or sets a prefix. It requires administrative permissions to set the prefix.
commands.arguments: If no arguments are passed, returns the prefix. Otherwise, sets the prefix for the server.
